title: OPPO K10 (Black Carbon, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, USB Cable, Charger, Sim Ejector Tool, TPU Protective Case, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: DIRAC Effect, Standalone Audio Decoder Chip WCD9370
product_specification.Other Display Features: Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90.80%, Color Saturation: 96% NTSC, Aspect Ratio: 20.1:9, Contrast: 1500:1, 480 nits Brightness, 90 Hz Refresh Rate, SRF 2D High Defination Film
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 50 MP Main Camera (Samsung S5KJN1SQ03, f/1.8 Aperture, FOV: 77 Degree, 1/2.76 inch Sensor Size, 0.64 um Pixel Size, 5P Lens, 4.05 mm Effective Focal Length, 27 mm Equivalent Focal Length, Auto Focus) + 2 MP Bokeh (GalaxyCore GC02M1B, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, 1/5 inch Sensor Size, 1.75 um Pixel Size, 3P Lens, 1.75 mm Effective Focal Length, 21 mm Equivalent Focal Length, Fixed Focus) + 2 MP Mono (GalaxyCore GC02M, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, 1/5 inch Sensor Size, 1.75 um Pixel Size, 3P Lens, 1.77 mm Effective Focal Length, 21 mm Eqivalent Focal Length, Fixed Focus), Camera Feature: Photo, Video, Night, Expert, Panorama, Portrait, Timelapse, Sticker, Slow Motion, Text Scanner, Extra HD, Macro, Google Lens, CMOS Sensor, 20 Continuous Shots
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16 MP Camera Setup: (Sony IMX471, f/2.0 Aperture, FOV: 79.3 Degree, 5P Lens, 1/3.09 inch Sensor Size, 1.0 um Pixel Size, 25 mm Equivalent Focal Length, 3.41 mm Effective Focal Length, Fixed Focus), Camera Feature: Photo, Video, Panoramic, Portrait, Night, Timelapse, Sticker, CMOS Sensor
product_specification.Flash: Rear: LED (Single Color Temperature Light) Flash
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)| Front: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Geomagnetic Sensor, Optical Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Gravity Sensor, Virtual Gyroscope, Pedometer
product_specification.Ringtones Format: MP3, AMR, APE, OGG, FLAC, WAV, MIDI, WMA
product_specification.Other Features: 180 Hz Touch Sampling Rate, 33W SuperVOOC, In Cell Full Lamination Touchscreen, 10 Touch Points, UFS 2.2, OTG Storage Format: FAT32, NTFS, EXTAT, 2 TB OTG Storage, Dual RAM Channel, Shooting Mode: Touch the Screen, Press the Volume Button, Use Gestures, Tap the Virtual Button to Take Photos, Caihong Twice Reinforced Glass Protection, Screen Lock, Tips, Notes, Recorder, Compass, Calculator, Weather, Firewall/Harassment Blocking, Data Backup, File Compression and Decompression, File Encryption Function, Program Lock Function, Application Encryption Method: Pattern Lock, Digit Password, Alphanumeric Password, Fingerprint, Facial Recognition, Split Screen Mode, Picture in Picture, Video Floating Window (Small Window Mode), L1 WideVine Key, Office Tools, Time Plugin, Banner Call, Power Key to End a Call, Kids Space (Guest Mode), World Time, Flashlight Function, Screen Recording, Application Clone, OPPO Share, 16 Pin USB, Reverse Charging, Vibration Motor: Rotor Motor, IPX54 Rated Ingress Protection, 2 Microphones, Super Linear Speaker, Dual Mic Noise Cancellation
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, AGPS, BDS, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS
product_specification.Video Formats: AVI, 3GP, MP4, WMV, MKV, MOV, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In-Box Accessories

product_description.Stunning Design: Oppo K10 boasts a stunning design that is eye-catching. Moreover, its dirt-resistant and scratch-proof matte build makes it adventure-ready and durable.
product_description.Breathtaking Imagery: Powered by AI, the camera that is equipped on Oppo K10 helps you capture colour-enriched photos during your travels that are breathtakingly beautiful.

review: Very Nice phone it's charging time is to fast i really impressed with phone but camera was a good how i am think

Phone is good at this price point. 90hz Display is good enough. Dual speaker offers good sound. Charging is pretty fast. Only 50mp sensor is good and the other two 2mp sensors are not useful. They could have provided an ultra wide or telephoto sensor insted of these two 2mp sensors. Also disappointed with Android 11 out of the box. It would be nice if it was Android 12. Overall not much to complain considering the price. Good phone .

Look and buildwise phone is awesome but the main selling point was their 50MP camera which isn’t true. It does feel like 2 MP camera. Rest everything is good at this price point. Camera lovers don’t go for it

Product was good but camera is not satisfied for me.
Batter is good performance
Charging also good
Performance also good
The only draw back is camer is not as expected
Must buy value for money best software n performance is faster

Overall phone very smart & nice looking.

Hello, Friends Don't even think about the buying this mobile even with a discount offer, I explain why, first thing I hate about this mobile is poor GPU performance, camera quality not good most of the time I get blurry images, battery drains frequently without doing any usage, sound quality is ok, the display is good, also it came out of box android 11 and color os 11.1, when I talk about with oppo customer care about this they even don't answer properly so this mobile is not future proof with the update it seems, Buy at your Own Risk.

Flipkart's Return policy is a joke

I try to talk with Flipkart many times they are just called back as a formality they don't resolve anything, don't ever buy anything from this seller he never accepts your product.

Im long time flipkart Customer but im regret about my purchase not gonna buy anything from Flipkart, it was very bad experience i had

I decided to buy this phone primarily due to exchange offer. The price which was offered to my old mobile during placement of order was reduced to nearly 70% at the time of picking up. This despite, phone was in perfect working condition with no damage whatsoever.
In this price range superb mobile..iam satisfied. in low light conditions camera performance is not good.
Good looking phone thanks oopo and Flipkart

The phone is not performing as much as expected,
the brand says that this phone has a 50-megapixel camera but I clicked some photos and I'm shocked! this phone is not even clicking better photos than my old phone and after one day, I had installed BGMI and again this phone disappointed me. The problem I was facing, was that the gyroscope was responding very slowly.
that's why I want to request all of you, If you want to purchase this phone for camera or gaming then this phone will undoubtedly disappoint you.
Heating issue with the phone and battery drainage issue performance is pathetic.
